sentences.en: a boring movie full of bad dialog
sentences.cn: 充满差劲对白的乏味电影

sentences.en: Any possible solution to the Irish question can only come about through dialogue.
sentences.cn: 任何解决爱尔兰问题的可行方案只能通过对话产生。

sentences.en: He is a very deft novelist too, with a superb ear for dialogue.
sentences.cn: 他同时也是一名才思敏捷的小说家，很善于搜集对话方面的素材。

sentences.en: He turned the dialogue to that point, and thanked him for it.
sentences.cn: 他立即转向了这个话头, 并对他表示感谢.

sentences.en: It is yet premature to predict the possible outcome of the dialogue.
sentences.cn: 预言这次对话可能有什么结果为时尚早.

sentences.en: It seemed to me that I was being shut out of the dialogue and that's something I just don't cotton to.
sentences.cn: 我觉得自己完全插不上话，这让我很不爽。

sentences.en: She believes these talks will be the start of a constructive and mean-ingful dialogue.
sentences.cn: 她认为这些谈话将是一次具有建设性的、有意义的对话的开端。

sentences.en: She came back and tried to start a dialogue with the man.
sentences.cn: 她回来试图与那个男子展开对话。

sentences.en: Students were asked to read simple dialogues out loud.
sentences.cn: 学生被要求大声朗读简单的对话。

sentences.en: That book has a good plot and much clever dialogue.
sentences.cn: 这本书的情节引人入胜,并有许多巧妙的对白.

sentences.en: The dialogue is amusing but the plot is weak.
sentences.cn: 对白逗趣但是情节薄弱。
对话十分难堪，让人不堪忍受。

sentences.en: The dialogue is in Spanish, with English subtitles.
sentences.cn: 对话是西班牙语，配有英语字幕。

sentences.en: The dialogue remained light and friendly.
sentences.cn: 对话仍然是轻松友好的.

sentences.en: The naturalness of the dialogue made the book so true to life.
sentences.cn: 自然逼真的对话使得这本书非常贴近生活。

sentences.en: The novel has long descriptions and not much dialogue.
sentences.cn: 这部小说描述多对话少。

sentences.en: The play was full of slangy dialogue.
sentences.cn: 剧中充斥了大量俚语对话。

phrases.tran_cn: 聋子的对话（指对话各方对其他方所说的话充耳不闻的对话）

trans.tran_en: a conversation in a book, play, or film
